content.question: In paragraph 6, sentence 3 (“I also liked . . . priceless“), the author uses the phrase “I thought” primarily to

choices.label: claim that other people who changed careers had an experience similar to her own
qualify her original opinion about the educational philosophy of the school
introduce an element of doubt about the authenticity of her narrative
indicate the amount of indecision she experienced before finally choosing her school

content.answer: qualify her original opinion about the educational philosophy of the school

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
